verses.1: Topa -aʼ ci un, van mite aw; minthanna le hatna Topa -aʼ ci un.
verses.2: Ama minthanna Topaʼ tungah pia unla, a siangtho kizepna tawh Topa bia un.
verses.3: Topaʼ awging tuipite tungah kiza hi. A minthang Pasianʼ aw ging damdam a, tui tampite tungah Topaʼ aw kiza hi.
verses.4: Topaʼ awging vanglian a, Topaʼ awging, liatna tawh kidim hi.
verses.5: Topaʼ awging in taamtak singte kitansak a, Topaʼ awging in Lebanon mual taamtak singte a kuaitan hi.
verses.6: Lebanon mual le Sirion mualte bawng no le gamsial no bangin amah in a diangsak hi.
verses.7: Topaʼ awging in meikuang taang khiasak hi.
verses.8: Topaʼ awging in gamlak lok a, Topa in Kadesh gamlak lok hi.
verses.9: Topaʼ awging in singkungte heek gawp a, gammang tulak hawk khia-in a kolhsak hi. Ama biakinn sungah a vekpi-un awngin, “Pasianʼ min thang tahen,” a ci uh hi.
verses.10: Topa in tui thukpite uk a, a tawntung kumpi hihna tawh Topa a tu hi.
verses.11: Topa in ama mite tungah thahatna pia tahen. Topa in ama mite tungah nopsakna thupha pia tahen.
